ProfileCard.Description: A Software Engineer who has developed countless innovative solutions.

DescriptionCard.Content: Fullstack developer with a technologist degree in Internet Systems at Catholic University of Pernambuco, experienced in SaaS solutions, CRMs, and intuitive interfaces. I've worked on event management projects, hospital CRM, and content creation platforms... Always focused on best practices, accessibility, and responsive design.

DetailsCard.Card1: I just like build creative stuff...
DetailsCard.Card2: Reading: Grokking Algorithms - Aditya Y. Bhargava...
DetailsCard.Card3: Interests: Math and statistics | Web 3.0 | AI | Robotic

Projects.title: Featured Cases
Projects.description: My creative spirit comes alive in the digital realm. With nimble fingers flying across the keyboard, I craft clear experiences out of nothing but ones and zeroes...

Contact.rightMessage: With a keyboard as my brush, I paint vivid experiences using nothing but the language of ones and zeroes.
Contact.about: Based in Recife, Brazil, I am an innovative fullstack developer, always working with innovation and creativity. My passion for clean, minimalist design, scalable architecture, and intuitive user experiences is evident in every project I build.
